txt.en: 'With all these brigands about, the hunting is poor in this land.'
'Oh, for an ale and a joint of beef!'
'This axe has hewn many a spider and spilled a sea of ichor!'
'I'll not be letting brigands or spiders overrun Archet...I've a debt to pay to the Brackenbrooks.'
'Captain Brackenbrook was young when last I saw him. Men age so swiftly!'
'I am fresh from the Mirkwood. Fine spider-hunting there!'
